function.name: get_scores_for_given_date_for_football_score_api
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "football_score_api", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "If you want to know the list of football matches for a given date and what was their scores you can use this API.
All this api needs is the date input in the format %Y-%m-%d.
Eg:- 2022-12-01"
